data.name: ToolTipNewWorldQuickstart
data.value: Create a new world using the default settings: Game Type: Survival Mode Scenario: Medieval Planet Auto-Save: ON

data.name: NotEnoughMaterial
data.value: Niewystarczająca ilość materiałów aby stworzyć nowy blok.

data.name: MessageBoxTextTutorialQuestion
data.value: Chcesz zacząć od zobaczenia samouczka wideo? Pamiętaj: zawsze możesz do niego wrócić klikając "Samouczki" na ekranie "Pomocy" (naciśnij F1).

data.name: SteamOverlayDisabledText
data.value: Proszę włączyć nakładkę Steam w kliencie Steam: przejdź do ustawień, zakładka w grze, Włącz dostęp do Społeczności Steam oraz w bibliotece steam, Medieval Engineers, właściwości, Włącz dostęp do Społeczności Steam w grze

data.name: MessageBoxTextRecommend
data.value: Jeśli podoba Ci się Medieval Engineers, możesz ją polecić znajomym na Steam na następującej stronie. Rekomendacje pomagają rozwijać społeczność. Dziękujemy!

data.name: Multiplayer_LastMsg
data.value: Nie otrzymano odpowiedzi od serwera przez {0} sekund.

data.name: NewVersionAvailable
data.value: Nowa wersja Medieval Engineers jest dostępna!

data.name: SpectatorControls_Free_Desc
data.value: Wolny widok. Możesz wciąż wchodzić w interakcje z kontrolowanym obiektem

data.name: SpectatorControls_Static_Desc
data.value: Statyczny obserwator. Kontrolujesz postać, ale kamera jest nieruchoma.

data.name: MessageBoxErrorFactionsTag
data.value: The house tag must be exactly 3 letters long.

data.name: LoadingError_ModifiedOriginalContent
data.value: Błąd podczas wczytywania oryginalnych plików gry, nie można załadować pliku: {0} Oryginalne pliki zostały prawdopodobnie zmodyfikowane, cofnij wszystkie modyfikacje i spróbuj ponownie. Najlepiej usunąć folder 'SpaceEngineers\Content\Data' a potem wybrać w Steam 'Sprawdź spójność plików gry'. Przeinstalowanie czasami nie pomaga, ponieważ steam nie usuwa nieznanych plików!

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettingsBarbarians
data.value: Barbarians can appear in the world.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettingsModeCreative
data.value: Building is instant, players can fly, and they cannot die.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettingsModeSurvival
data.value: Building requires resources, players cannot fly, and they can die from injuries or starvation.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettingsStructuralSimulation
data.value: Buildings can fall under their own weight. If a building support is damaged, it can cause the building to collapse.

data.name: TooltipScreenGraphicsOptions_ShadowMapResolution
data.value: Choose the quality of shadows or disable them completely.

data.name: WorldSettings_SeasonDuration_Tooltip
data.value: The duration of each season, measured in days.

data.name: WorldSettings_SolarAltitude_Tooltip
data.value: The maximum angle of the sun, compared to the equator, measured in degrees.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettingsDayDuration
data.value: The length of days, measured in minutes.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettingsDayNightRatio
data.value: The ratio between days and nights.

data.name: DialogAmount_SetValueMinutesCaption
data.value: Value to set, measured in minutes.

data.name: DialogTextJoinWorldFailed1
data.value: Błąd podczas dołączania do świata, powód: {0}

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettingsAnimals
data.value: Wild animals can appear in the world.

data.value: Your player name is now hidden

data.name: NotificationCharacterBroadcastingOn
data.value: Your player name is now visible

data.name: NotificationHintJoystickEditRopeRelease
data.value: Go to control menu in order to edit rope settings

data.name: NotificationHintJoystickPressToUseWardrobe
data.value: Access control menu in order to change appearance

data.name: NotificationEditLockableDrum
data.value: Hold {0} to configure the Rope Drum.

data.name: ScreenLockableDrum_LockRope_Tooltip
data.value: Locking the rope will prevent it from being attached or detached.

data.name: ScreenLockableDrum_UnlockRope_Tooltip
data.value: Unlocking the rope will allow it to be attached and detached.

data.name: ScreenLockableDrum_MinLengthError
data.value: Minimum length must be less than maximum length.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettingsPlayerBots
data.value: Maximum number of servants a player can control.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettingsUncontrolledBots
data.value: The maximum number of AI controlled elements. This includes barbarians and animals, but excludes player controlled servants.

data.name: ScreenLockableDrum_SetCurrentMaxToolTip
data.value: Set current rope length as maximum limit.

data.name: ScreenLockableDrum_SetCurrentMinToolTip
data.value: Set current rope length as minimum limit.

data.name: Inventory_ContextualHelp
data.value:
Inventory Controls Double-click: Move item stack to the next inventory. Shift-click: Move all items of selected type to the next inventory. Ctrl-click: Move half of the item stack to the next inventory. Alt-click: Move one item from stack to the next inventory.
Right-click: Activate Item. Right-click drag: Move half of the item stack. Ctrl + right-click drag: Drag an item and enter the amount to move.

data.name: Crafting_ContextualHelp
data.value:
Crafting Controls Double-click recipe: Add recipe to queue. Ctrl + double-click: Add recipe to queue 5 times. Shift + double-click: Add recipe to queue 10 times. Shift + Ctrl + double-click: Add recipe to queue 15 times. These modifiers also work for the craft button.
Right-click crafting progress bar: Cancel current craft. Right-click production queue: Remove whole item from production queue. Alt + right-click production queue: Remove one item from production queue.

data.name: Map_ContextualHelp
data.value:
Click on the areas on the globe to the left to select the different kingdoms on the planet. Double-click on a region on the map to zoom into an area. Right-click on the map to zoom back out to region overview.
Green shields indicate areas owned by you. Blue shields indicate areas owned by allies. The money bag icon indicates there are taxes about to run out. The red arrows indicate that there is conflict in this region or area.
The house/tower/castle icon indicates there are constructions in this area.
Click the fast travel button to enable fast travel mode.

data.name: ControlName_ConsumeButtonTooltip
data.value: Click to eat the selected item.

data.name: DialogText_QuestionLeavingLobby
data.value: Do you really want to leave the castle siege lobby?

data.name: ControlName_TrashButtonTooltip
data.value: Click to drop the selected item.

data.name: NotificationHintPressToPlaceFromInventory
data.value: Press {0} to place projectile from inventory.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettingsRespawnCart
data.value: You will spawn with a cart where you can respawn in the future and store supplies.

data.name: ScreenSpawn_ItemAmountTooltip
data.value:
Number of items to spawn / add to inventory.
Accepts a number between {0} and {1}.

data.name: ToolTipGameOptionsUIBkOpacity
data.value: Change opacity of UI dialog backgrounds.

data.name: ScreenGameplayOptions_WarningGatherables
data.value: Are you sure you want to erase all gatherables (mushrooms, bushes etc.) from your world? Note: this does not involve already collected items.

data.name: ScreenGameplayOptions_WarningResources
data.value: Are you sure you want to erase all loose resources (logs, stones, branches and scrap wood) from your world? Note: this does not involve resources stored in inventories.

data.name: NotificationRespawnShipDelete
data.value: Temporary cart. It will get removed after original owner leaves the game.

data.name: BlueprintScreen_IncompatibleModVersion
data.value: Schemat który próbujesz wkleić pochodzi z modyfikacji która może nie być kompatybilna z tą wersją gry, może brakować kilku bloków lub przedmiotów. Czy na pewno chcesz wkleić?

data.name: BlueprintScreen_SurvivalMode
data.value: Nie można wklejać schematów w trybie przetrwania.

data.name: ScreenDebugAdminMenu_EnableAdminMode_MedievalTooltip
data.value: Włącza możliwość kopiowania/wklejania, tworzenia obiektów (SHIFT+F10), obserwacji (F7-F9) i teleportowania (CTRL+Spacja)

data.name: ToolTip_Crafting_CannotRepairEquipped
data.value: Nie możesz naprawić używanego przedmiotu. Przestań używać go najpierw.

data.name: ScreenFaction_FactionTable_FactionToolTip
ScreenFaction_JoinToolTip
data.value: Wyślij wniosek, aby dołączyć do wybranego domu.

data.name: ScreenFaction_JoinToolTip_NoHumansAllowed
data.value: Ten dom nie akceptuje żadnych inżynierów.

data.name: ScreenFaction_LeaveTooltip_PromoteToFounder
data.value: Musisz mianować kogoś innego założycielem aby opuścić ten dom.

data.name: ScreenFaction_EditToolTip
data.value: Edytuj ustawienia swojego domu, takie jak tag, nazwa, informacje i wiadomości.

data.name: ScreenFaction_AcceptJoinRequestTooltip
data.value: Zaakceptuj wybranego członka do twojego domu.

data.name: ScreenFaction_DenyJoinRequestTooltip
data.value: Nie akceptuj wybranego członka do twojego domu.

data.name: ScreenFaction_KickTooltip
data.value: Wykop wybranego członka z twojego domu.

data.name: ScreenFaction_KickTooltip_CannotKickSelf
data.value: Nie możesz wykopać siebie z domu.

data.name: ScreenFaction_KickTooltip_CannotKickFounder
data.value: Nie możesz wykopać właściciela z domu.

data.name: ScreenFaction_KickTooltip_CannotKickLeaders
data.value: Nie możesz wykopać innych liderów z domu.

data.name: ScreenFaction_KickTooltip_CannotKick
data.value: Nie możesz wykopać tego członka z domu.

data.name: ScreenFaction_PromoteTooltip_ToLeader
data.value: Mianuj wybranego członka liderem. Liderzy mogą akceptować/odrzucać wnioski, wykopywać graczy i zarządzać stosunkami dyplomatycznymi twojego domu.

data.name: ScreenFaction_PromoteTooltip_ToFounder
data.value: Zmień właściciela domu na wybranego członka. Uwaga: Utracisz status właściciela!

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettings_Inventory2x
data.value: Players' inventories will have twice as many slots.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettings_PermaDeath
data.value: Players will start as a new character after they die.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettings_Decay
data.value: Buildings and parts of buildings that are not attached to the ground will decay over time.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettings_Spectator
data.value: Allow players to use the specator camera.

data.name: WorldSettings_ShowPlayerNames_Tooltip
data.value: Whether or not players will be able to show their names at a distance.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettings_FastTravel
data.value: Allows players to quickly travel long distances.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettings_TravelReachability
data.value: Limit fast traveling through areas owned by enemies and areas with difficult terrain.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettings_TravelEmptyAreas
data.value: Allow fast traveling to areas that have not been developed by players.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettings_TravelCooldownMultiplier
data.value: Travel cooldown is the time that must be waited before fast trevel can be used again, measured in seconds. The cooldown is increased by this amount of time for each area that is traversed. For example, if three areas are traversed, this value will be multiplied by three.

data.name: ToolTipWorldSettings_TravelMaxDistance
data.value: The maximum distance that can be traveled in a single journey, measured in areas. Fast travel can be used again to journey farther after the cooldown has expired.

data.name: WorldSettings_SliderHint
data.value: Right click sliders for default values, Ctrl+click to type a number.

data.name: ToolTipMap_FastTravelDisabled
data.value: Fast travel is disabled in this world.

data.value: Show only servers marked as favorite.

data.value: Show only servers hosted on your local network.

data.name: JoinWorldScreen_ServerFilter_Custom_Tooltip
data.value: Show only servers matching a custom filter. Click the custom button to customize the filter.

data.name: JoinWorldScreen_Custom_Tooltip
data.value: Click here to make a custom filter.

data.name: JoinWorldScreen_Refresh_Tooltip
data.value: Refreshes the server list by re-downloading the list from Steam.

data.name: JoinWorldScreen_JoinWorld_Tooltip
data.value: Attempt to join the selected world.

data.name: JoinWorldScreen_ToggleFavourites_Add_Tooltip
data.value: Adds this server to your favourites.

data.name: JoinWorldScreen_ToggleFavourites_Remove_Tooltip
data.value: Removes this server from your favourites.

data.name: JoinWorldScreen_ToggleFavourites_CannotAddPlayerHosted_Tooltip
data.value: You cannot add player hosted servers to your favourites.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_GameMode_Tooltip
data.value: Select the game mode the server must match.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_GameMode_Unfiltered_Tooltip
data.value: Do not filter servers by game mode.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_GameMode_SurvivalOnly_Tooltip
data.value: Only display servers running survival mode.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_GameMode_CreativeOnly_Tooltip
data.value: Only display servers running creative mode.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_ServerMode_Tooltip
data.value: Select the server mode the server must match.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_ServerMode_Unfiltered_Tooltip
data.value: Do not filter servers by server mode.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_ServerMode_ClientHosted_Tooltip
data.value: Only display servers hosted by players on their computer.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_ServerMode_History_Tooltip
data.value: Only display servers you have recently played on.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_ServerMode_LAN_Tooltip
data.value: Only display servers hosted on your local network.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_ServerMode_Friends_Tooltip
data.value: Only display servers that currently have friends playing on them.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_MatchVersion_Tooltip
data.value: Only display servers that match the game version of your client.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_MatchData_Tooltip
data.value: Only display servers that match the game data of your client.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_GroupAllows_Tooltip
data.value: Only display servers whose steam group settings allow you to join the server.

data.name: CustomizeFilterScreen_Vanilla_Tooltip
data.value: Only display servers that aren't running any mods.

data.name: LoadingError_WorldVersionTooOld

data.name: LoadingScreen_Tooltip_VersionTooOld

data.name: ToolTip_Map_FastTravelButton
data.value: Fast Travel is used to cover long distances. There may be limitations based on difficult terrain and enemy areas, maximum distance may be limited by the game settings, and if travel cooldown is enabled, fast travel will not be available again for some time.
